questions: Q. 1. Why is the motion of a circulating fan nonuniform ?
answers: Ans. The motion of a circulating fan is non-uniform because the direction of motion changes at every point.

questions: Q. 2. Give one example of a body whose average velocity is zero. 1 Mark each
answers: Ans. When the body returns back to initial point, e.g., when an athlete returns back to starting point, his average velocity is zero.

questions: Q. 3. Give one example of a body whose average speed is zero.
answers: Ans. Average speed of a moving body can never be zero.
